head.title: Primary Day in New York and in Connecticut

meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

hedline.hl1: Primary Day in New York and in Connecticut

block.p: NEW YORK POLLING HOURS: 6 A.M. to 9 P.M. (New York City, Nassau, Suffolk, Westchester, Rockland and Erie Counties); noon to 9 elsewhere. The most closely watched races are the Democratic primaries to choose challengers to Senator Alfonse M. D'Amato and Gov. George E. Pataki. Other primaries include contests for Attorney General, Congress and the State Senate and Assembly.

NEW YORK POLLING HOURS: 6 A.M. to 9 P.M. (New York City, Nassau, Suffolk, Westchester, Rockland and Erie Counties); noon to 9 elsewhere. The most closely watched races are the Democratic primaries to choose challengers to Senator Alfonse M. D'Amato and Gov. George E. Pataki. Other primaries include contests for Attorney General, Congress and the State Senate and Assembly.
CONNECTICUT POLLING HOURS: 6 A.M. to 9 P.M. Democrats hold primaries for Secretary of State and State Treasurer and for the First Congressional District.
